items.name: Tawa Paneer
items.description: A popular dish in every Indian resturant. Indian cottage cheese cooked in spicy flavourful gravy made with freshly ground spices and topped with onion and capsicum petals.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Lahori Green Chicken Curry
items.description: Chicken cooked in spicy green gravy base with fresh ground spices and topped with cream.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Paneer Schezwan Frankie
items.description: Spicy paneer cooked with chinese sauces, wrapped in roti with onion, cabbage and frankie masala. A perfect spicy snack. Served with schezwan chutney for an extra kick

items.name: Panner Tikka Salad
items.description: Paneer marinated with tikka masala and grilled mixed with lettuce, onion, tomato, toasted bread cubes, bell peppper, cucumber and lemon-honey dressing to make a healthy satisfying salad

items.name: Kashmiri Dum Aloo
items.description: Baby potatoes roasted and cooked in a tangy, spicy and flavourful yogurt based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Pork Bafat Masala
items.description: Pork cooked with onions, ginger, chillies, garlic and spicy bafat masala. A Manglorean dish definitely worth trying.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Dahi Papadi Chaat
items.description: A street style snack of papadi smeared with thick yogurt mix topped with spicy green chutney, tangy sweet chutney, pomegranate seeds, chaat masala and sev

items.name: Quinoa & Chickpea Salad
items.description: Quinoa, chickpea, cucumber, onion, lettuce, feta cheese, tomato & olives topped with some zesty lemon, garlic & olive oil dressing.

items.name: Soya Chunks Aloo Dum
items.description: Soya bean chunks and roasted potatoes cooked with cramalised onion, tomato puree, ginger, garlic and spices into a flavourful spicy curry
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Kadhai Jhinga
items.description: Stir fried prawns cooked with ginger, smoky chilles, tomato and fresh coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Kurkure Aloo Tikki Chaat
items.description: Mashed potato patty cooked till crisp, smeared with a mix of spicy & sweet-tangy chutney, sev, tomato, onions and fresh corriander and pomegranate seeds.  (2 tikki)

items.name: Pav Bhaji
items.description: Mix of different veggies boiled and cooked in a spicy flavourful gravy of onion, tomato and fresh pav bhaji masala topped with butter and fresh corriander served with 2 buns

items.name: Khumb Matar Malai
items.description: Creamy button mushroom curry with cardamom, cashew nut and green peas with freshly ground spices making it a warm and comforting meal.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Champaran Lamb Curry
items.description: A dish from the nothern part of India with spicy flavourful lamb pieces cooked together with spices, chillies, garlic, ginger and fresh ground spies, slow cooked on low flame to perfection.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Bhel Puri
items.description: Street style snack of puffed rice mixed with spicy chutney, sweet tangy chutney, papadi, sev, onion, tomato and fresh coriander making it a flavourful snack.

items.name: Oats and Rava Idli
items.description: Steamed cakes made of oats and semolina (granulated wheat) mixed with yogurt, onion, cashew and chilles. Served with coconut chutney.

items.name: Veg Navratna Pulao
items.description: Assorted veggies, cashew nut and rasins cooked together with spices & fragnant basmati rice, topped with fresh coriander and mint leaves. Served with a side of mint dip + papad + achar

items.name: Thalassery Biryani
items.description: A malabar style chicken biryani. Chicken cooked with cramalised onions, cashew, yogurt, spicies and coconut milk along with small grain rice, mint leaves, coriander and fried onion. Served with yogurt dip + acahar + papad

items.name: Street Style Veg Manchurian Frankie
items.description: Assorted veggies mixed with chinese spices and sauces fried till crispy and wrapped in roti with onion, cabbage and noodles

items.name: Anda Ghotala
items.description: Scrambled eggs cooked with onion, chilies and other spices in a thick sauce topped with a half fried egg. Served with 2 buns.

items.name: Burnt Garlic Fried Rice
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish made with assorted veggies and rice cooked in chinese sauces and topped with crispy burnt garlic flakes.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of paneer in soy basil sauce

items.name: Chicken Burnt Garlic Fried Rice
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies, boneless chicken and rice cooked in chinese sauces and topped with crispy burnt garlic flakes.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Vada pav
items.description: A famous veggie burger from the streets of Mumbai. The patty is made of boiled potatoes mixed with spices, coated in chickpea flour and fried to perfection. This is stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney. (2 vada pav)

items.name: Coconut Rice
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked in ghee with cashew, curry leaves, dried chilli and fresh coconut, tempered with mustard seeds

items.name: Palak Paneer
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in a creamy flavourful spinach based gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices. A complete comfort meal.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Afghani Chicken
items.description: A creamy delicious chicken dish made with yogurt, cream, onions, cashew paste, spices and chilles
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Egg Bhuna Roll
items.description: Hardboiled eggs cooked in spicy onion & tomato based gravy with flavourful fresh ground spicies wrapped in whole wheat bread with some cabbage and onions

items.name: Oats Sattu Cheela
items.description: Oats, roasted chickpea flour, onions, chillies, ginger and spices mixed together into a thick batter and pan roasted. Served with tangy onion & tomato chutney. (2 cheela)

items.name: Matar Ka Nimona
items.description: Green peas blanched and ground into coarse paste and then cooked with diced veggies, roasted potatoes, garlic, ginger onion and spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Malvani Mackerel Curry
items.description: A dish from the coast of Malvan. Fiery Mackerel curry cooked in a thick flavourful gravy of onion and tomato and freshly ground malvan spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Dal Oats Kebab
items.description: Lentils, oats, onion, toamto, chillies, garlic and ginger mixed with spices and made into patty, coated with bread crumbs and shallow fried. Served with green spicy chutney. (3 kebabs)

items.name: Thalipeet
items.description: Flatbread made of mixed grain flour with spices & onions. A very heathy meal served with tangy onion & tomato chutney. (2 thalipeet)

items.name: Navratna Korma
items.description: A rich dish made with assorted mix of veggies and nuts in a creamy gravy with spices. A flavourful comfort for your soul.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Maharashtrian Lamb Curry
items.description: Fiery lamb curry cooked with onion, garlic, ginger, chilli and flavourful spies in a thick gravy
items.extra: make it a meal with rice/2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chicken Bhuna Roll
items.description: Grilled chicken thigh cooked in spicy onion & tomato based gravy with flavourful fresh ground spicies wrapped in whole wheat bread some with cabbage and onions.

items.name: One Pot Chicken Rice
items.description: Chicken marinated with ginger & garlic paste and spices pan roasted in ghee and cooked together with onion, rice, coconut milk and flavourful spices

items.name: Veg Chowmein Noodles
items.description: Street style food with assorted veggies mixed with spicy sauces, thin noodles and stir fried to perfection. A go-to street food for everyone.
items.extra: make it even more delicious with some crispy manchurian dry

items.name: Chicken Chowmein Noodles
items.description: Steet style food with assorted veggies and flavourful chicken mixed in spicy sauces, thin noodles and stir fried to perfection. A go-to street food for everyone.
items.extra: make it even more delicious with some crispy manchurian dry

items.name: Aloo Cholle Tikki Chaat
items.description: Crispy potato patty in a flavourful chickpea curry smeared with spicy green chutney, tangy sweet chutney, onion, tomato, sev and pomegranate seeds

items.name: Palak Garlic Dal Kichidi
items.description: A comfort meal of all time! Spinach, lentils, onion, tomato, garlic and spices pressure cooked for a flavpurful one pot meal. Served with papad and achar.
